short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert emojis using a web browser, and customise the experience and the add-on in Settings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use emojis in the browser. You can find by keyword, or by category, and just click on the emoji you want to copy, then you will be able to insert you with "Paste" (or Ctrl+V).
